alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Freestone; Limestone (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 4:00PM CDT until March 31 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Freestone County in central Texas... North central Limestone County in central Texas... Northwestern Anderson County in central Texas... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 358 PM CDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorms was located from near Tehuacana to Streetman, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mexia, Fairfield, Wortham, Montalba, Fairfield Lake, Fairfield Lake State Park, Lake Mexia, Richland-Chambers Reservoir, Brushy Creek, Tehuacana, Streetman, Kirvin, Bradford, Bois D`arc, Stewards Mill, Blackfoot, Cayuga, Yard, Springfield and Bethel. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 198 and 211. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central and north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
